definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: This is denuded of an electron, it is Na plus.
sentences.chinese: 这边是裸电子的，是钠正离子。

sentences.english: It comes from the fact that in an electrochemical cell, the cations are those that are reduced.
sentences.chinese: 这来源于在电池中，正离子是被减少的。

sentences.english: Look at beryllium 2 plus, very tiny, charge plus two.
sentences.chinese: 例如铍二正离子，非常小，带2个单位正电。

sentences.english: So, let's say we're asked for the plus two ion.
sentences.chinese: 我们说我们被要求解2价正离子。

sentences.english: Magnesium 2 plus, it is also isoelectronic with neon.
sentences.chinese: 镁二正离子，同样也与氖等电子。

sentences.english: So, helium plus is a one electron system.
sentences.chinese: 所以氦正离子是一个单电子系统。

sentences.english: For example, the positive ions, these are electron deficient.
sentences.chinese: 例如，正离子，是缺少电子的。

sentences.english: Lithium 2plus is a one electron atom.
sentences.chinese: 锂二正离子是单电子原子。

sentences.english: Catastrophe is a downturn. So that is the cation.
sentences.chinese: 灾难表示衰退，所以那就是正离子。
